sentences.en: A thin gold band rests lightly on King of Ithaca , lord of Zenith , hero of troy.
sentences.cn: 一条细箍金带轻轻地系在他卷曲的黑发上.

sentences.en: Grander people sought Homer's Ithaca on Lefkada or elsewhere on Kefalonia.
sentences.cn: 格兰德人认为荷马笔下的爱塞卡在奈福喀德或在凯法利尼亚.

sentences.en: He longed to see again the rugged hills and pleasant shores of Ithaca.
sentences.cn: 他渴望重新看到伊萨卡的崎岖的小山和优美的海岸.

sentences.en: He told them how the palace at Ithaca was filled with evil men.
sentences.cn: 他还告诉他们伊塔刻的宫殿里如何挤满了心怀叵测的人.

sentences.en: He went all the way up to Ithaca just to watch a stupid hockey game?
sentences.cn: 他千里迢迢驱车到伊萨卡,难道仅仅是为了看一场没意思的冰球比赛?

sentences.en: Laurie Drinkwater at Cornell University in Ithaca , New Yorkwasn't offer , was an author of the report.
sentences.cn: 纽约伊萨卡岛的科内尔大学劳里德林克沃特是报道的主编.

sentences.en: One after another they sailed to Ithaca.
sentences.cn: 他们相继来船驶往伊萨卡.

sentences.en: Oxford and Cambridge (England) feel like Ithaca or Hanover: the message is there, but not as strong.
sentences.cn: 英国的牛津和剑桥感觉就像伊萨卡岛或者汉诺威：虽然也在发着类似的消息，但是比较微弱。

sentences.en: Today's Ithaca could then morph into Homer's Doulichion.
sentences.cn: 现在的爱塞卡也许在那时融进了荷马笔下的都利琴岛.

sentences.en: Weinstein, Arnold L . Vision and Response in Modern Fiction Ithaca, NY: Cornell University Press, 1974.
sentences.cn: 《现代小说中的憧憬与反应》, 以色佳,纽泽西: 康乃尔大学出版社, 1974.

trans.tran_cn: 伊萨卡岛（希腊西部爱奥尼海中亚群岛之一）
伊萨卡岛（希腊西部爱奥尼亚海中群岛之一，为希腊神话中Ulysses的故乡）
